name: Crocs World Construction Kit 2
description:
"Crocs World Construction Kit 2" is finally there!
Did you ever dream of creating and playing your own Jump'n'Run levels? Now you can do it by creating and playing your own custom levels of Croc's World!
You can publish your levels on the internet and other players can play them as well!
And if you don´t want to create any levels you can just choose from tons of levels created by others!

Features:
- Editor to create your own jump'n'run levels
- 6 different settings to choose from
- 48 items to choose from
- 6 endbosses
- publish your own levels on the internet
- play levels created by others
